item.description:
I'm really excited to see this show  this year as my buddy Liz is in it!

All tickets are now sold, sorry!

The 42nd annual Christmas Revels follows a group of Irish emigrants heading for America aboard the RMS Carpathia in December 1907. As Christmas draws near the children want to know, "How will we celebrate?" The answer? With blazing jigs and reels, rousing songs and lilting ballads, fantastic stories, carols and rounds for all to sing, a brass ensemble, a Mummers play, and a champion Irish band. Join us this holiday season for a rollicking and joyous Irish Christmas!

If you've never been to the Christmas Revels before, it's quite an experience. At one point during the show the entire audience gets up and snakes off into the hall at Saunders Theater, dancing and singing. There's lots of singing....and it's all very festive..come and join us! There are some very well known Irish musicians on the stage this year..should be a treat.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Grafton St pub at 5. 45 for dinner first OR in Sanders theater at 7.15PM in foyer near CD/merch table
item.name: The Christmas Revels: An Irish Celebration of the Winter Solstice
